summary: "Charlie and the Chocolate Factory" (2005) is a musical fantasy film directed by Tim Burton. Based on Roald Dahl's 1964 novel, it stars Johnny Depp as Willy Wonka and Freddie Highmore as Charlie Bucket. Charlie wins a contest to tour Wonka's chocolate factory with four other kids. The film was in development for years, with many directors and actors considered. Burton used practical effects and built sets, making the film a critical and commercial success. It earned over $475 million worldwide and received award nominations for its costume design and Depp's acting.
title: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory (film)
